title: [Client] Login Problems
body:
After the last update i had problems to login, the client said: "Unable to connect to the authentication service. Check the server status here. If it looks good, follow the guide here." 
I have already done all the steps in the linked guide.

After that i tried to reinstall the game.
After the reinstall i get the following error: "Could not connect to the HTTP Server. Please check that your internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access." 

After that i spoke to my admin. Because i have to use a proxy,(http,https,ftp - All set up in the internet options in Windows), i thought this would be the problem of it. There were no changes to the proxy for the last months, so its not a problem they induced.

Then I did a wireshark log and we analysed it together. During the analysis we found, that not all requests are using the proxy. 
First there are some http-requests trying to reach the AWS who not use the proxy. I dont know if that is related to LoL.
Second there is a request that is using the proxy, but doing it wrong. It tries to get the following URL: "GET HTTP://http:///system/rads_user_kernel.exe.version HTTP/1.1" Without a host but with double protocoll...

replies.body: It sounds like you're going through a series of connection issues here failing to reach patching and authentication servers.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  If the issue continues, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help.  There's a possibility that proxy settings could be causing some blocks if you're using them, so we can take a deeper look through there.

This problem is still there.{{summoner:3}}  It is very anoying to log into the game by using a mobile internet connection or a tunneling Service or a free wifi and than switch back to LAN. 
pls tell RIOT about that problem. ( I did already long time ago without any response).

Thank you for your reply.
As of was seems to sound legit  (as far as i on my self have no possibility to change something on this, in most ways transparent, Proxy)
